plugin.name: cdn-asset-pipeline
plugin.author: Benoit Hediard
plugin.title: CDN Asset Pipeline Plugin
plugin.description: Provides Gant scripts to automatically upload Grails app static assets to CDNs. Those scripts can easily be integrated to a build pipeline for continuous delivery/deployment. It uses Asset Pipeline Grails Plugin to precompile assets and Karman Grails Plugin to upload files to various Cloud Storage Services.
